data.message:
you know i been bullied all my life
never ever had someone to call a whife

i know my life, and yess im white
and yess i might just go and bite
on every motherfuckers who say'd that i cannot rap

Cuz one time they threatened my whole damn family

ye i was surrounded by the fucking enemy

I wanna feel free
so i tell you all can you feel me

I know that life ain't easy
but people cannot appreciate me when i just try to be me

and i remember when i called my ex
she lay down in bed and say'd she just wanted to have some god damn good sex
her mum was the only thing left

drunk as fuck all the day in bed
cuz she was an alcoholic and so really bad

she think that she can fool me
i never gonna go back to that house again so she could use me, man you really gotta trust me

and she was calling my mom so bad things
she say'd she really think about to kill me in her dreams

And you know is kind of tough
everyday she drink the same stuff
and one day i really say'd to her 
enough is enough

and i always stay cool
so she doesn't even know what to do

and my mom wants me to go back to school

but she give it up cuz i ain't good at school, and i always felt like i was to fucking cool for school

i was never good in school
just was acting like a fool
doesn't know what to do
music is the best thing i can do
and one day i hope i meet you
and your crew

if you come to norway i can show you what i can do
so you can see what i can do
when i rap in front of you and the whole crew

cuz what i say i can do i really can do so don't think im a fool
when everybody knows i'm talking the thruth
